ThingDef.label: elixir of lycanthropic separation
ThingDef.description: An elixir prepared using werewolf blood. When ingested by someone afflicted with dormant lycanthropy, they will be cured and a manifestation of the slumbering werewolf will be created.\n\nBe careful, even though the werewolf will be in a weakened state, it will still be able to inflict lycanthropy, and the consumer will not be immune to reinfection.

ThingDef.label: elixir of lycanthropic assimilation
ThingDef.description: An elixir prepared using werewolf blood. When ingested by someone afflicted with dormant lycanthropy, the disease is assimilated into the body, providing an increase to certain stats and capacities. Reinfection of Sanies Lupinus will cause the assimilated lycanthropy to return to its dormant state.\n\nThere is a 10% base chance that the elixir will fail, and the pawn will suddenly morph into one of Hircine's hounds. The chance of failiure will decrease by 10% of the base chance of failing for each quality level above awful, with a legendary elixir having no chance of failing.

ThingDef.label: elixir of wolfsbane protection
ThingDef.description:
An elixir prepared using wolfsbane extract. Prevents the ingestor from becoming infected with lycanthropy, though every time an infection is prevented the active elixir will weaken.

The stength of the effect depends on the quality of the elixir, with the strength increasing by 10% per quality level, or 100% for legendary.
The strength will decrease by 5% every time infection is prevented.

HediffDef.label: elixir of wolfsbane protection
HediffDef.description: Prevents the ingestor from becoming infected with lycanthropy, though every time an infection is prevented the active elixir will weaken by 5%.

ThingDef.label: elixir of wolfsbane retaliation
ThingDef.description:
An elixir prepared using wolfsbane extract. Causes the ingestors blood to burn werewolves, though every time werewolf is burnt the active elixir will weaken.

The stength of the effect depends on the quality of the elixir, with the strength increasing by 10% per quality level, or 100% for legendary.
The strength will decrease by 5% every time a werewolf is burnt.

HediffDef.label: elixir of wolfsbane retaliation
HediffDef.description: Burns werewolves that attack the ingestor, though every time a werewolf is burnt the active elixir will weaken by 5%.
